text: :Do not confuse with gravitational wave. In fluid dynamics, gravity waves are waves generated in a fluid medium or at the interface between two mediums (e.g. the atmosphere or ocean) which has the restoring force of gravity or buoyancy. ==Other websites== * Gallery of cloud gravity waves over Iowa * Time-lapse video of gravity waves over Iowa * Water Waves Wiki Category:Fluid mechanics Category:Atmosphere
title: Gravity wave
